website_summaries.verdict: This conditioner is infused with Australian tea tree oil, milk proteins, and micro-infused peppermint oils to give your hair luxurious shine, hydration, and balance.
pros: Helps your hair feel weightless, healthy, and soft
Good for men who don't want a floral scent
cons: Some don't love the minty smell

customer_reviews.title: Good for scalp but just ok for hair
customer_reviews.text: The tea tree and mint formula of this conditioner is really great (along with the matching shampoo) for oily itchy scalps. I no longer have chronic itchy scalp thanks to this shampoo and conditioner. However, it's a mediocre conditioner on the hair itself. I have thick coarse hair and this conditioner does nothing to de-tangle or smooth out my hair strands. I haven't had this problem with other conditioners before. With this conditioner, I have to use a hair serum on my hair afterwards in order to de-tangle my hair so I can comb through it. I'll stick with the shampoo, but I'm going to switch to a different conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: DiL

customer_reviews.title: Includes isopropanol alcohol...
customer_reviews.text: Love OGX products usually but after buying this conditioner I'm a bit more weary. It says it's hydrating but lists multiple alcohols including rubbing alcohol which is very drying. I think it's probably used to enhance the mint smell and feel. After two uses my wavy, medium thickness hair is like straw though so the great mint smell just isn't worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra C Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: I have dandruff and my scalp itches as well. I use dove intensive repair shampoo along with this conditioner. When I used both in the shower today, most of the itchiness went away. But not all of it. Contrary to what a few reviewer‘s have stated, the shampoo is thick, and it doesn’t come out like tapwater. It also has a nice, pleasant, minty smell. If you have dandruff, you should definitely consider buying this shampoo. But if you like fruity or floral sense, then don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after a month of purchasing the item. This is an amazing product it got rid of my dandruff within a week. Don’t expect it to work overnight continue to use it if you do not see results instantly. I had extremely bad dandruff due to bleaching and it truly helped rejuvenate my dry scalp and reduce itching it’s an 100% yes for me will be using this product consistently. It also smells great & really moisturizes your hair. I don’t wash my hair every day and I go to the gym after 4-5 days of not washing it still really feels clean so like I said great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maira Cerpa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very strong! Super minty! It also leaves a menthol feel to my scalp. Thought it would help my scalp (dry/itchy) but so far no change since I’ve used the product. Not impressed. Won’t purchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Davia

customer_reviews.title: Growing my hair out during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I started growing my hair out back in April since I’ve been working from home as of March. With this experience comes many learning opportunities on hair products. I got this conditioner because it sounded good and my girlfriend used a different version from the same brand. I found the scent to be somewhat unpleasant. Also the consistency is very thin. It’s liquidy and takes a lot to get all over my hair which is just 6 months long. I feel like a woman with long hair would need half a bottle per use
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I don't particularly like this conditioner...
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner has a very nice mentee smell however it doesn't seem to work very well as a conditioner. I do like the shampoos they offer I'm just not real thrilled over this particular conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the tea tree mint product that I used to purchase at the salon that closed due to Covid. It costs 1/4 the price and might as well be the identical product. My hair is just as soft and smells exactly the same, possibly better. I had never seen this product prior to Amazon; but am glad that I have found it. Hopefully it will still be around in another year when it is time to restock (I’m a guy with short hair, a nickel sized blob is plenty every single day).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Michels

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest My Hair Has Ever Felt!
customer_reviews.text: Best Conditioner Ever! It smells great & feels amazing. My hair feels the cleanest it has ever felt. Coupled w/this same shampoo, My hair has never looked or felt better!
customer_reviews.author: Mysti

customer_reviews.title: Great Conditioner for a Variety of Needs
customer_reviews.text: Love the OGX line in general but this conditioner is fantastic. Tea Tree has a ton of uses including help with dry scalp, flaking, itchy head and as a bonus, helps keep lice in check. The conditioner smells great (no shortage of tea tree in the forumula) and leaves hair smelling great and soft! Use with the shampoo for a perfect match up!
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Ruyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoos and conditioners
customer_reviews.text: OGX has great shampoos and conditioners. The scents are awesome. We get the tea tree whenever there’s an outbreak of lice at school to prevent getting it. This one smells more minty than tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: H. Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine, soft hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had very fine, soft hair that would “poof” out after a shower. After discovering this product and using it in conjunction w the same brand/scent shampoo, I no longer have that problem! The conditioner really helps my hair and I’ll be a customer for as long as this product is sold.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: Mine seemed like it was watered down. I’ve used OGX before and I’ve never seen the conditioner as watery as this was and such a weird consistency. I’m not sure if it’s due to a bad batch or not but I was slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this Conditioner. It leaves my hair in a tangled mess.
customer_reviews.author: KrisDuv

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I love the shampoo in this product but the conditioner does nothing for me at all! I leave it on for a few mins and my hair still feels stripped from the shampoo! Maybe it’s my hair type (fine strands but lots of hair and natural wave).
customer_reviews.author: rak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Winter Scalp
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use this shampoo along with its conditioner every winter due to dry scalp/dandruff. It works amazingly well, treats my dry scalp and it doesn't make my hair fall out (sulfate-free, yay!) It doesn't smell like flowers or anything, but for its purpose it's perfect. I would describe the smell to sweet peppermint. Great buy. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Flores

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good! Like minty candy!!
customer_reviews.text: You really smell the mint in this one. It smells so good and reminds me of creme de menthe. It moisturizes well without weighing it down. My hair is a medium texture, not fine and not thick. I do leave it in a few minutes while I'm shaving before rinsing it out. I can't get over how good it smells, but the scent does linger, so if you're around someone sensitive to smells, it might be a bit too strong if mint bothers them.
customer_reviews.author: JandA

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell with hint if mint
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the smell. It has a very cocaobutter smell to it with a hint of mint. Smells more of a yucky candy. Seems to work on but only used it once due to the off-putting smell.
customer_reviews.author: Octi

customer_reviews.title: The smell of this is pleasant but I am not ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this is pleasant but I am not impressed by the conditioning aspects of it. Plainly put, it doesn't get the tangles out of my kids' hair and I end up using an additional conditioner to do that. I'll just put tea tree oil in other conditioners instead of buying this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I tried it but absolutely no use of this I ordered two of this but not really a good one I bought it because of their shampoo but both really sucks and my dandruff never went
customer_reviews.author: Rohith kumar

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great conditioner (I use the shampoo also). This conditioner gives me just the right amount of softness without weighing it down. I have natural grey hair that is curly/wavy and so this is important to me that my curls do not get droopy. I use a half dollar's worth on my just below chin length hair and rinse after being on my hair for 5+ minutes. :)
customer_reviews.author: B.Kolar

customer_reviews.title: Good product smells good.
customer_reviews.text: it's tea tree mint conditioner. It smells like it says it would, and does help to moisturize your hair. not much else to say about it. it's just conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: KVH

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off. I usually purchase from Target and noticed the bottling, stickers and writing were all different. It doesn’t have the same consistency, smell or tingling sensation the real one does. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: I stayed at a hotel that had this shampoo and conditioner and I had to have it. The sent relaxes you and make your hair clean and soft. Best shampoo and conditioner ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tarl C.

customer_reviews.title: The best item out there for dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and conditioner. This works better than any other item for dry scalp. Skip all the "head and shoulder" type shampoos and go with tea tree if you have dry scalp issues. Smells nice too!
customer_reviews.author: AngelLeah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite drugstore shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drugstore shampoo! I have pretty oily hair but using this helps my hair last at least 3 Days! I love the scent and a a little goes a long way. I love tee tree and the argan oil scent!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: [In regards to both shampoo and conditioner:] The smell was ok, but they made my hair feel dry and stringy like hay; then made it super greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good conditioner, will buy more from this brand
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is absolutely amazing. I’ve used it a couple times now and noticed a huge difference. My hair is much softer and smoother. The conditioner smells amazing and it tingles a little when you use it. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: TZ_Here

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! only thing that cured itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: I tried soooo many products and this cured my itchy scalp and I also used it to wash under arms - I had been unable to use soap or any kind of deoderant and this works
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Made my scalp breakout
customer_reviews.text: My scalp broke out like crazy and I couldn't stop scratching. There were big red bumps along my scalp line that would occasionally turn into zits which caused dry itchy scalp. Sometimes the bumps would reappear in the same spots. I thought that this was due to my allergies so I continued to use this for a couple of months before I looked into it to see other similar complaints. I stopped two days ago and already my scalp is healing.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: don't use for damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: my hair has been bleached repeatedly and I don't benefit a lot from this conditioner, unfortunately. That being said, this conditioner isn't specified for damaged hair. My sister steals my conditioner all the time and her hair is looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Carrel

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, really makes your scalp tingle. I purchased as a pre-wash scalp treatment (@jasminerea) Definitely recommend- does just what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn J

customer_reviews.title: creates frizz
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same shampoo and after the first use of both, my hair was very frizzy/staticy. I like that you can feel the cleanliness and light weight it gives. If using the shampoo, use a different conditioner and vise versa. I bought a different conditioner and that has helped a lot with the static I was having.
customer_reviews.author: mistym

customer_reviews.title: The Worst OGX scent/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this, its not like the one from the store. It smells like a mint candle and made my scalp super dry & causes dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Warzyniak

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing enough
customer_reviews.text: Well I tried other products on amazon before but wanted to try a new product. I saw this one had a lot of positive review. I don’t say that I didn’t like it but it wasn’t the best. I liked the scent but felt my hair is not moisture enough after applying this conditioner even though I don’t have a damaged hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Oooooh that smell, can't you smell that smell?
customer_reviews.text: What a refreshing smell, I love it. My wife loves it and the kid wants to shower after me to smell it as well. My hair is softer with other products, but none of them have smelled this good.
customer_reviews.author: Vulgar Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy conditioner, works well
customer_reviews.text: Heavy conditioner, leaves my bleached hair soft and silky. Not fond of the scent but that's preference. Sweet, minty, maybe a little too sweet smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Zane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my type of hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my type of hair, smells really good, leaves my hair soft and hydrated.I bought the conditioner too
customer_reviews.author: Cantabela

customer_reviews.title: Best for scalp issues and increasing the softness of hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have had an issue with my scalp..psychorisis and since I've been using this product, I haven't had any issues and my hair is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Conditioner, only one I use
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this at my local grocery store, but it was out of stock so I came to Amazon. I got a better price for what I already love, it's a win/win.
customer_reviews.author: AGTG2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how this smells. It has a great tea tree oil scent and makes my hair so soft compared to other similar conditioners I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: We buy this because tea tree oil is good for keeping away lice, and you can never be too careful in the public school system. We also love the mint smell.
customer_reviews.author: twinzmom511

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for shaving my head. Great smell and it conditions my scalp for the shave. The tea tree also helps with mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both love this conditioner. It does not have a big tingle factor in it. The smell is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tocha B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Companion to the Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: the Conditioner is great it has a not overpowering scent and rinses out thoroughly, great addition to the shampoo and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my husband who has sensitive skin and psoriasis. This provided relief that lasts and keeps his hair so soft. His scalp is no longer so itchy it makes him go mad. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: MY SCALP IS VERY DRY AND MY HAIR WOULD ALWAYS FLAKE UP,WASHING MY HAIR I FELT THE MINT TINGLING FEELING IN MY SCALP IT FELT AMAZING, SINCE USING THIS BRAND I HAVE NOT HAD ANY FLAKING IN MY HAIR.AFTER USING THE CONDITIONER MY HAIR WAS VERY SOFT AND SILKY AFTER LETTING IT AIR DRY
customer_reviews.author: Tina S

customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend usually prefers coconut milk, but was still pleased with this scent instead
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite💕
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this conditioner .it makes my hair so soft and smooth and the smell is everything!!!😉
customer_reviews.author: amanda o

customer_reviews.title: It works good for my hair ...test is individual choice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since very long. Try first if it suits you nothing great then this .
customer_reviews.author: Shivendra Vivrekar

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the minty smell, never really get the tingly feeling they describe on my scalp but I wasn’t really expecting to. My hair feels soft and clean after, it’s not amazing or anything but pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: My favorite conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I got this conditioner because in colder months I suffer from dry scalp. This conditioner soothes my scalp and makes my hair look fantastic! I also recommend trying their coconut shampoo and conditioner! Good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Robison

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra money & buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Bought it because of the price. The scent is very strong. My hair is damaged, and this doesn’t help fix it - just makes me realize that I need a haircut.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your hair smelling fresh and feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, it smells so fresh. I use this on my toddler’s hair who can no longer tolerate baby shampoo. She has fine, curly hair and it leaves it soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for my dry hair. The tea tree smell is great!
customer_reviews.author: ɴᴋ

customer_reviews.title: Don’ buy it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Had good reviews mostly so bought. Made my hair feel gross. I Wish I could return it. Used it 3 times and I hate it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upset about leaking
customer_reviews.text: All of the conditioner was OUT the bottle. Had to squeeze the product out the plastic. 🤦🏾‍♀️ (Smells good & works tho)
customer_reviews.author: daisha

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells great I love the companies products and it's great to my hair
customer_reviews.author: Dashay

customer_reviews.title: Very good for hair care.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very good and the mint is invigorating.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia odeshina

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My son gas dandruff and this knocks it right out! Smells amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky rose

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner that smells like thin mints
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a very itchy scalp and I thought the cooling of the mint would help. I don't find it makes much difference, but it does smell like a thin mint girl scout cookie. Overall I think it is a good value for the price and it does its job as conditioner, but I wish it left my head less itchy.
customer_reviews.author: DeeM

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: Smell so good really relaxing feel so good on my scalp
customer_reviews.author: cytherea Iverson

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love the smell and if you live near the woods like I do then you want something that the mosquitoes are not attracted to and that is tea tree oil!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: woo!
customer_reviews.text: Like this brand and scent, moisturizes and de-tangles long hair well!
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This makes your hair soft and in the summer I don’t seem to be bothered by mosquitoes or flies as much as those around me. Or maybe I’m just to sweet!
customer_reviews.author: fairchild

customer_reviews.title: It’s so good for itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this condition it smells so good and my hair is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try It
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the way it makes my hair and scalp feel. Will purchase again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Rita Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Same thing I said for the shampoo! Great for dandruff
customer_reviews.author: Crystalblue Parshall

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Smells like toothpaste and does about as good of a job as a conditioner. Leaves your hair tangled and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: They have wavy to curly hair and whether they wear their hair natural or blow it out their hair is always soft and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this shampoo and conditioner. They have wavy to curly hair and whether they wear their hair natural or blow it out their hair is always soft and beautiful. They're happy, momma's happy (:
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuko

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and does a good job moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Took me a while to get used to the viscosity, but overall I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Kuma

customer_reviews.title: Really liked
customer_reviews.text: Nice low price. and it Isn't quite the same as the "expensive stuff" but it'll do the job. Good scent and feel. And if your hair is like mine it will be nice and moisturized, and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It smells great
customer_reviews.text: I truely love this product its the only one I use
customer_reviews.author: stacey daniel

customer_reviews.title: As good as more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: This product is half the price of the Chi Tea Tree oil that I was buying and I love it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer s

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair feeling super dry.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair feeling super dry. No moisturizing, no softness after use.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Kicklighter

customer_reviews.title: Itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've been looking for a conditioner to help with my itchy scalp. It surely didn't help and after each use, it makes my hair weigh down. Wish I could return it. Don't buy if you're having a itchy scalp for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: So Wan Choi

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the worst conditioner I have ever used. And the price is just not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Bolor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works well and it's helping with dry scalp. Smells great! Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith R.

customer_reviews.title: A really amazing experience
customer_reviews.text: After spending 6 weeks on the Big Island of Hawai'i working on a feature, my mop needed some serious tlc and this stuff Worked well. I wish they had a bigger bottle, my mop just soaked it up! Going to order a full case....
customer_reviews.author: H. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I have straight hair and doesn’t seem to do much conditioning. The smell does help me when I have headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this conditioner and it leaves my hair smelling great and super soft! Also a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sonalee B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as extra strength
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt have the potency as extra strength ogx tea tree
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from a conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: While it smells great, this conditioner did not really work on my long hair. It had a very runny consistency. I would not buy it again. However, it works fine as shaving lotion.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the smell. Doesn’t smell like tea tree :( over all it is a generic conditioner good for medium thickness hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Maintains hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells like mint, but hasn’t made a world of difference to my hair
customer_reviews.author: RHornback

customer_reviews.title: Super soft hair that smells incredible
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a million Stars for the way this smells.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Low quality conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is a mediocre start for a tea tree conditioner, the conditioner itself is very light and you need to use a lot in order to condition everything, it also seems to be more irritating than soothing as right after use I will still have scalp itch. But it is only 6 bucks so you are really getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Left my locs nice and soft using this paired with the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product but the coconut kind and I loved it, but unfortunately I cannot say I love this. The smell was a little over powering, on top of the smell, it make my head very itchy. To be fair, I have very sensitive skin. I had to stop using this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reeves

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I have finicky curly hair. Since ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have finicky curly hair. Since I can't shampoo everyday, but must condition every day, this gives me a clean, invigorating feeling on my "conditioner only" days.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Doesn’t have a bad smell but it’s a little watered down for my hair (I have very thick hair).
customer_reviews.author: Edilia Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Very good conditioner. It made the hair soft and shiny and had a good scent. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Smells really night and keeps my hair nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Smells really night and keeps my hair nice and soft. I love this tea tree conditioner. I have short wavy hair and this product always makes my hair feel like and soft
customer_reviews.author: RockstarG

customer_reviews.title: A bit too sweet smelling
customer_reviews.text: Of the various tea tree/mint conditioners I've used over the years, this is by far the one that smelled (during washing my hair and afterwards) the most sweet, almost like a type of chewing gum.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton M.

customer_reviews.title: Still a good product im guessing as my hair didnt fall off
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected, thought tree tea mind woyld give you that tingle on your scalp, but it doesnt. Still a good product im guessing as my hair didnt fall off.
customer_reviews.author: DrAgOnX1sT

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, makes my hair feel soft. Nice and minty
customer_reviews.author: BLColeman

customer_reviews.title: It smells sooooo good. More like mint than tea tree
customer_reviews.text: It smells sooooo good. More like mint than tea tree, which makes me think maybe there's not enough tea tree oil in it. Both shampoo and conditioner are thick and luxurious feeling. You'll see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: FriendlyPharmacists

customer_reviews.title: The mint alone is awesome, the teatree is a bonus scent
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner wakes me up and puts a smile on my face. The mint alone is awesome, the teatree is a bonus scent.
customer_reviews.author: NoneTheWiser

customer_reviews.title: Its a light conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Its not as thick as I thought but its still conditioner so im not complaining. I wouldnt say you need to use both tea tree conditioner and shampoo together, doesnt make a difference
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with an itchy scalp, this seems to work well for me
customer_reviews.author: Sports mom

product_meta.title: OGX Hydrating TeaTree Mint Conditioner, 13 Ounce Bottle, Hydrating and Nourishing Conditioner Infused with Australian Tea Tree Oils
product_meta.description: Infused with Australian tea tree oil, peppermint extract, and witch hazel that leaves hair shiny and locks in moisture to keep hair hydrated. After shampooing, apply conditioner and work through the ends as it is a great detangler for thicker hair strands. Leave in hair for up to 5 minutes, and rinse. With a lightweight and sulfate-free formula, this refreshing conditioner is a great haircare product for fine hair, straight hair, curly hair, thick hair, coarse hair and damaged hair.
feature_bullets: HELP HYDRATE & NOURISH YOUR HAIR with our conditioner for fine, damaged, oily, & frizzy hair that needs extra moisturizing & nourishing love. Daily use formula helps to smooth hair, reducing appearance of split ends for a healthy-looking glow.

NOURISH & DETANGLE: OGX's Tea Tree Mint formula is for straight hair, curly hair, thick hair, thin hair. Gentle enough for fine hair & fierce enough for thick or coarse hair. Helps to nourish, rejuvenate & detangle hair as it works deep into every strand.

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.

YOUR ORIGINALITY INSPIRES US; at OGX we don't try to make your hair look perfect because it is. We'd rather make it look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier or bouncier and smell irresistible too, so you love it even more
